snippet.title: Night Stones - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
🎮 Play the Night Stones Demo Now 🌙👉
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2300340/Night_Stones

Night Stones is my first open world game. I started working on it after playing and loving A Short Hike, which was also developed by one person. I am bringing gameplay and story elements from my favorite old school RPGs like Legend of Zelda: Windwaker and Final Fantasy VII.

Night Stones is a cozy open world game on a magical island you’ve seen in your dreams. Customize your character and start your adventure home as you chat with quirky characters, learn magical spells, control the time of day, and explore the wilderness in your glider.

⌨️ Chat Night Stones & Gamedev on Discord 👋
https://discord.gg/eaGcV6rfKQ

🎬 Video Editing and Music Composition by Jonathan Oster 🎵
https://www.jonathanoster.com/music

#crpg  #cozygames #openworld
